CREATE TABLE 테이블명
    AS SELECT *
       FROM 복사할 테이블명
       WHERE 1<>1

code3:
UPDATE  CHAP10HW_EMP 
	SET     DEPTNO='70'
	WHERE   SAL > (
		SELECT AVG(SAL)
		FROM CHAP10HW_EMP
		WHERE DEPTNO='50'
	)
code4:
UPDATE     CHAP10HW_EMP
	SET     SAL = SAL * 1.1
		        , DEPTNO ='80'
	WHERE     HIREDATE > (
		SELECT MIN(HIREDATE)
		FROM CHAP10HW_EMP    
		WHERE DEPTNO = '60')
code5:
DELETE  FROM CHAP10HW_EMP 
	WHERE   EMPNO IN (
	SELECT  E.EMPNO 
	FROM  CHAP10HW_EMP E, SALGRADE S
	 WHERE E.SAL BETWEEN S.LOSAL AND S.HISAL
		AND GRADE = '5'   
)
